about_the_game:
Prepare for an intense, action-packed dungeon-crawling adventure with a twist! This game combines the best of vampire survivor-style mayhem and classic dungeon exploration.

Progress Your Way:
Level up your character with powerful upgrades each time you survive, customizing your skills and abilities to suit your play style.

Dynamic Difficulty:
You choose how challenging each dungeon is! Want to face more bosses? Increase enemy numbers? Or strengthen the foes you encounter? The choice is yours, and each decision shapes your journey deeper into the abyss.

Endless Adventure:
Fight your way through waves of relentless enemies, confront brutal bosses, and earn valuable power ups as you battle for survival. Every level brings new dangers, fresh upgrades, and exciting strategies to master.

Are you ready to brave the ever-deepening dungeons and create your legend?
Choose your challenge and conquer the darkness!

name: Ulgamor: Dungeon Arena
short_description: Delve into endless dungeons in this thrilling blend of vampire survivor action and classic dungeon crawling. Level up your character with unique upgrades and face your fate: increase number of bosses, enemies, or their strength to shape your challenge. How deep can you go? The choice is yours!
